summary: Asks the question, Is it really possible to relate to ones parents and siblings after being replaced by the family dog? . . . Perhaps as friends - weird friends?
cast: Shawn Hatosy|DJ Qualls|Tom Bower|Nikki Reed|Ann Dowd|Cameron Richardson|Georgia Mae Lively|Kevin Murray|Angus Sutherland|Keith Woodard|William Rough|Dennis Cupp|Jacqueline Harvey|Chris Jenkins|Chris Jenkins|Mark Joy|Paul Lieberman|Craig Talbot|Rebecca Taylor|Tom Townsend
title: Familiar Strangers
